loadnotes: Stations 1 and 4 may only carry IRMs or 165 gal FTs (600L, weight 1100, load 3.0/2.0, and fuel 50).
Stations 2 and 3 may carry 200 gal FTs (700L, weight 1300, load 3.0/2.0, and fuel 60), BBs, or RPs.
Station 3 may carry a BB, Mark 28 nuclear bomb (weight 2100 and load 3.0), or an MDR with two IRMs.
May only use AIM-9B through AIM-9P IRMs.
